title: Emerald-Kissed Diamond Jhumka: A Timeless Elegance
features: Intricate filigree work ('jaali') on the dome, studded with brilliant-cut diamonds. The top features a floral motif centered with a vibrant pear-shaped emerald, surrounded by diamonds. Delicate pearl drops add a touch of classic South Indian elegance. The design perfectly blends traditional craftsmanship with modern sparkle.
occasions: and special occasions (like a half-saree function). Also suitable for adding a touch of tradition to modern events.
description: This Diamond Jhumka is a statement of timeless elegance. Crafted with exquisite detail, it features a vibrant emerald and shimmering diamonds set in 22K gold with Hyderabadi polish. The delicate pearl drops add a touch of traditional charm, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come. Experience the perfect fusion of traditional artistry and contemporary brilliance.
